subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Possibly from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*baːr||bloom, flower}}; compare {{cog|my|ပန်း}}. Probably the same etymon as {{och-l|[[瓣]]|petal}} ({{zh-ref|Schusessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[flower]]
# [[beautiful]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} classifier for lamps
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} classifier for things that are strung together
